name: Dan Siwiec
title: Sr. Delivery Principal
about:
Dan is a Sr. Delivery Principal for Technology Enablement in the San Francisco office with over 15 years of professional experience. His areas of expertise include Machine Learning Engineering, modern stack cloud native application design and development, CI/CD and software engineering best practices.

Dan has led many agile teams, designing and implementing large-scale full-stack enterprise systems involving complex integrations and driving implementation of modern software practices.

items: Led an assessment of Machine Learning Operations maturity within a science and research group performing complex modelling and drug discovery tasks
Assessed the fit of modern ML platforms such as Kubeflow, MLflow and AWS SageMaker
Designed and advised on a roadmap of implementing a standard, efficient ML workflow
Architected an Event-Driven system based on Apache Kafka composed of ~20 microservices, enabling real-time decision-making supporting airport’s operational capabilities
Led a team of 15 backend, frontend, mobile and DevOps engineers and Data Scientists to develop the system
Advised on the design and implementation of a Machine Learning pipeline
Implemented many critical parts of the system
Part of a focused specialist team deployed in response to an urgent Severity 1 production incident in client’s payment processing gateway
Responsible for investigation and identifying the cause of the incident
Prepared a holistic assessment of client’s software delivery process
Producing a thorough report for the bank’s CTO
